DOC.brief_summary: Study assess relative bioavailability two 7.5 mg meloxicam tablet ( American type ) compare one 15 mg meloxicam tablet ( American type ) , investigate dose-proportionality dosage range 7.5 mg 15 mg
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability Meloxicam 2 x 7.5 mg Tablets Compared 15 mg Tablet Dose Proportionality Over Dose Range 7.5 mg 15 mg Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject determine result screen Written informed consent accordance Good Clinical Practice ( GCP ) local legislation Age > = 18 < = 50 year Broca > = 20 % < = + 20 % Any finding medical examination ( include laboratory blood pressure , pulse rate ECG ) deviate normal clinical relevance Gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunological hormonal disorder Surgery gastrointestinal tract ( except appendectomy ) Diseases central nervous system ( epilepsy ) psychiatric disorder Chronic relevant acute infection Hypersensitivity meloxicam and/or nonsteroidal antirheumatic agent Intake drug long halflife ( > 24 hour ) ( < = 1 month prior administration trial ) Use drug might influence result trial ( < = 10 day prior administration trial ) Participation another trial investigational drug ( < = 2 month prior administration trial ) Smoker ( > = 10 cigarette > = 3 cigar > = 3 pipes/day ) Inability refrain smoke study day Alcohol abuse Drug abuse Blood donation ( < = 1 month prior administration ) Excessive physical activity ( < = 5 day prior administration ) History hemorrhagic diatheses History gastrointestinal ulcer , perforation bleed History bronchial asthma For female subject : Pregnancy Positive pregnancy test No adequate contraception e.g . sterilization , intrauterine device ( IUD ) , oral contraceptive Inability maintain adequate contraception whole study period Lactating
